original_text: But Abraham said, ‘Child, remember that you in your lifetime received your good things, and Lazarus in like manner bad things; but now he is comforted here, and you are in anguish.
korean_text: 아브라함이 이르되 얘 너는 살았을 때에 좋은 것을 받았고 나사로는 고난을 받았으니 이것을 기억하라 이제 그는 여기서 위로를 받고 너는 괴로움을 받느니라

sentences.original_text: remember that you in your lifetime received your good things,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 살아 있을 때 좋은 것들을 받았던 것을 기억하라,

sentences.original_text: and Lazarus in like manner bad things;
but now he is comforted here,
